DESCRIPTION:
Prebiotics spray is an all in one spray essence. With today's busy schedule, people of all skin types can simply spray and go.

Prebiotics are equally essential for your skincare regime. These are non-living ingredients that are used to support the balance of both good and bad bacteria on your skin throughout your skin and within your body.

This spray:

·For face and body

·Multi-functional skin vitalizing essence spray

·Contains Prebiotics and ALL-natural ingredient

·Formulated to give a boost of hydration

·Leaves your skin soft and radiant

·Provides rejuvenating moisture

·USDA Certified Biobased

·Fragrance-free

·Made in USA, quality assured

*Exclusive sold in the US market.

In traditional Chinese and Tibetan medicine, Cordyceps was highly valued as a natural vitality elixir to help combat illness, improve immune system, and increase stamina

As a functional mushroom, cordyceps provides low-calorie nutrition, and a whole lot more:

*May Boost Exercise Performance

*Anti-Aging Properties

*Potential Anti-Tumor Effects

*May Help Manage Type 2 Diabetes

*Possible Benefits for Heart Health

*May Help Fight Inflammation

A stronger immune system, more energy, improved endurance, and better stamina, one ingredient can help with all of that. In traditional Chinese medicine, Cordyceps was highly valued as a natural vitality elixir to help combat illness, improve immune system, and increase stamina

Secret Ingredients keep you healthy:

Cordyceps Militaris is included in every sachet of Longrich Cordyceps Militaris Coffee.

A deep-layer skin care product that keeps your skin plump and shining. The lotion easily penetrates your skin, plays a role in protecting and improving your skin texture, and keeping the skin moisturized, delicate, and smooth.

Usage:

After washing your face, put an appropriate amount of the cream on your hand, rub them together and then massage your face with both hands. This cream can be applied over the whole body.

Formulated with advanced natural herbs which helps you to gently clean off skin dirt and soothe your skin. It contains olives and rosemary essence with other nutrients which gives pleasant scent and also helps you relax while bathing.

One toothpaste, Triple effects

Fluoride-free decay resistance formula: white tea essence prevents decay and improves dental roots conditions.

Deep cleaning: the soft silicon abrasives and natural peppermint flavor help clean the teeth, leaving you with a fresh breath.

Gain teeth strength: strontium chloride and composite aloe extract protects your teeth against sensitivity issue (discomfort from cold, heat, acidity and sweetness)

Multiple Effects:

*Natural peppermint flavor helps freshen breath

*White tea extracts help protect gums

*Xylitol helps strengthen teeth

1.Natural Ingredient: Sea buckthorn berry. It contains Vitamin E in its natural form which is that is stronger than synthetic Vitamin E and easier to be absorbed by human body

2.Highly Concentrated. Extraction rate 1:400. That means one ton of sea buckthorn berry fruit can only make 90 Oz. or 2.5kg of our berry oil.

3.Advanced Extraction Technology. Sea buckthorn berry oil uses internationally advanced, supercritical C02 extracting technology during production. Effectively protect the active ingredients from being damaged.

Contains refined bamboo charcoal extracts, effectively cleanses dirt, grime and excessive grease from skin, leaving skin feeling clean and fresh. Moisturizes, protects and softens skin, keeps skin clean and healthy. Mild formula ideal for different skin types. Recommended for daily use.

It cleanses and nourishes your skin, removes oil and dirt, also helps your skin stay fresh longer.

Leaving the skin fresh and smooth after using the soap.

Double filters design

The upper filter can be replaced with independently purchased cartridge after period time of use.

The bottom filter is firmly attached to the water bottle to ensure filter quality.

High-technology temperature insulation keep your drink at its desired temperature for longer hours compared to similar products.

Upper filter

With crystals that can change drinking water pH value to weak basic, making your daily drinking water to alkaline water.

Inner layer

Made with food-grade special high quality steel, environment friendly and longer durability.

Lower filter

Enhances the filtration process, helps reduce chlorine and other unwanted chemicals.
